channel.title: CVE Feed for Soliloquy Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Soliloquy Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35775|2024-08-12T22:55:15.186Z -- soliloquy%20team -- slider%20by%20soliloquy
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting'), Improper Authentication vulnerability in Soliloquy Team Slider by Soliloquy allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Slider by Soliloquy: from n/a through 2.7.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-51519|2024-06-11T17:06:26.931Z -- soliloquy%20team -- slider%20by%20soliloquy
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Soliloquy Team Slider by Soliloquy.This issue affects Slider by Soliloquy: from n/a through 2.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-51519|2024-08-02T22:40:33.761Z -- soliloquy%20team -- slider%20by%20soliloquy
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Soliloquy Team Slider by Soliloquy.This issue affects Slider by Soliloquy: from n/a through 2.7.2.
